refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies Treo foto databases to current directory and extracts .jpg files from them.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Copies Treo foto databases to current directory and extracts .jpg files from them.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: Copies Treo foto databases to current directory and extracts .jpg files from them.

blockquote.para: Use device file port to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable.If neither are found or supplied, pilot-treofoto will print the usage information.
Display version of pilot-treofoto and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for pilot-treofoto and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.
